comments:
Convert :class:`~gensim.models.wrappers.ldamallet.LdaMallet` to :class:`~gensim.models.ldamodel.LdaModel`.

This works by copying the training model weights (alpha, beta...) from a trained mallet model into the gensim model.

Parameters ---------- mallet_model : :class:`~gensim.models.wrappers.ldamallet.LdaMallet` Trained Mallet model gamma_threshold : float, optional To be used for inference in the new LdaModel. iterations : int, optional Number of iterations to be used for inference in the new LdaModel.
##### Returns
* ****: class
